system.description:
Trigger: A creature within Range is targeted by Grab.
Effect: The user joins the triggering rolls and checks, contributing their Size and WC to the side of their choice. If a Grapple is formed, the user also gains the Grapple Condition. 
The user may join an ongoing Grapple as a Simple Action on their Activation with this Action.
